chapter.text:
Amitai Ben Shushan Ehrlich, Threat Intelligence Researcher at SentinelLabs, talks to Dvir Sayag on the Hands-On Security podcast.
Amitai discusses his research into a series of extortion attacks against organizations carried out by Iranian APT group BlackShadow. He shares details of the groups modus operandi and attack vectors, offering valuable insight into how BlackShadow operates as well as practical mitigations.
Click play and enjoy the show!
